org.croudtrip.rest

Class TripsResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.croudtrip.rest.TripsResource

  • @Path(value="/trips")
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public class TripsResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource for managing trips.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TripOffer addOffer(User driver, TripOfferDescription offerDescription)
      Adds a new TripOffer which passengers can query for.
      NavigationResult computeNavigationResultForOffer(long offerId)
      Get the NavigationResult for an offer The result will contain a complete route visiting all the passengers pick-up and destination locations as well as a list of all the waypoints in the correct order of the current trip.

      Removes an offer.

    • Method Detail

      • addOffer

        @POST
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/offers")
public TripOffer addOffer(@Auth
                                      User driver,
                                      TripOfferDescription offerDescription)
                   throws RouteNotFoundException
        Adds a new TripOffer which passengers can query for.
        Returns:
        the newly created offer (which also includes the offer id!).
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException

      • getOffer

        @GET
@Path(value="/offers/{offerId}")
@UnitOfWork
public TripOffer getOffer(@PathParam(value="offerId")
                                     long offerId)
        Find an offer by id.

      • computeNavigationResultForOffer

        @GET
@Path(value="/offers/{offerId}/navigation")
@UnitOfWork
public NavigationResult computeNavigationResultForOffer(@PathParam(value="offerId")
                                                                   long offerId)
                                                 throws RouteNotFoundException
        Get the NavigationResult for an offer The result will contain a complete route visiting all the passengers pick-up and destination locations as well as a list of all the waypoints in the correct order of the current trip.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException

      • getOffers

        @GET
@Path(value="/offers")
@UnitOfWork
public java.util.List<TripOffer> getOffers(@Auth
                                                      User driver,
                                                      @DefaultValue(value="true")@QueryParam(value="active")
                                                      boolean showActiveAndNotFullOnly)
        Find all offers that belong to a particular driver.
        Parameters:
        showActiveAndNotFullOnly - if false this method will return all offers that belong to a driver, otherwise only those which are active (not disable due to timeouts etc.) and are not full (passengers can still join). Default is true.

      • getActiveOffers

        @GET
@Path(value="/active_offers")
@UnitOfWork
public java.util.List<TripOffer> getActiveOffers(@Auth
                                                            User driver)
        Find all active offers that belong to a particular driver. Even offers with a full car will be shown. Call this method if you want to get active running offers of a driver. Also TripOfferStatus.DISABLED offers will be shown, since the offer is basically active (from the point of view of the driver), but needs to be enabled again.

      • updateOffer

        @PUT
@Path(value="/offers/{offerId}")
@UnitOfWork
public TripOffer updateOffer(@Auth
                                        User driver,
                                        @PathParam(value="offerId")
                                        long offerId,
                                        TripOfferUpdate offerUpdate)
                      throws RouteNotFoundException
        Allows drivers to update their offers, e.g. update the drivers current location (which changes what passengers can join a trip).
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException

      • deleteOffer

        @DELETE
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/offers/{offerId}")
public void deleteOffer(@PathParam(value="offerId")
                                      long offerId)
        Removes an offer. You should probably NOT use this method, please consider finishing or canceling the trip instead.

      • queryOffers

        @POST
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/queries")
public TripQueryResult queryOffers(@Auth
                                               User passenger,
                                               TripQueryDescription requestDescription)
                            throws RouteNotFoundException
        Allows passengers to query for offers.
        Returns:
        the result will EITHER contain a list of TripReservation which indicate that trips have been found, OR a RunningTripQuery which means that a background search has been started. In the latter case passengers will receive a GCM notification once an offer has been found.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException

      • getQueries

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/queries")
public java.util.List<RunningTripQuery> getQueries(@Auth
                                                              User passenger,
                                                              @DefaultValue(value="false")@QueryParam(value="running")
                                                              boolean showOnlyRunning)
        Returns all running background queries for a passenger.
        Parameters:
        showOnlyRunning - if true this method will return only running background queries but not those which have been cancelled, finished, etc. Default is false.

      • getQuery

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/queries/{queryId}")
public RunningTripQuery getQuery(@Auth
                                            User passenger,
                                            @PathParam(value="queryId")
                                            long queryId)
        Returns a single running background query for a passenger.

      • deleteQuery

        @DELETE
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/queries/{queryId}")
public void deleteQuery(@Auth
                                      User passenger,
                                      @PathParam(value="queryId")
                                      long queryId)
        Stops one particular background query for a passenger.

      • getReservations

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/reservations")
public java.util.List<SuperTripReservation> getReservations()
        Returns all trip reservations ever made.

      • getReservation

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/reservations/{reservationId}")
public SuperTripReservation getReservation(@PathParam(value="reservationId")
                                                      long reservationId)
        Returns one trip price reservation.

      • joinTrip

        @PUT
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/reservations/{reservationId}")
public JoinTripRequest joinTrip(@Auth
                                           User passenger,
                                           @PathParam(value="reservationId")
                                           long reservationId)
        Allows passengers to join a trip by "accepting" a previously created TripReservation.
        Returns:
        the resulting join requests which indicates all further stages of a trip.

      • getJoinRequests

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/joins")
public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> getJoinRequests(@Auth
                                                                  User passengerOrDriver,
                                                                  @DefaultValue(value="false")@QueryParam(value="open")
                                                                  boolean showOnlyPassengerAccepted)
        Returns a list of join requests for either passengers or drivers.
        Parameters:
        showOnlyPassengerAccepted - if true this method will only return those join requests with a status of JoinTripStatus.PASSENGER_ACCEPTED. Default is false.

      • getDriverAcceptedJoinRequests

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/accepted")
public java.util.List<JoinTripRequest> getDriverAcceptedJoinRequests(@Auth
                                                                                User passengerOrDriver)
        Returns a list of join requests for either passengers or drivers where the status of the join request if JoinTripStatus.DRIVER_ACCEPTED.

      • getJoinRequest

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/joins/{joinRequestId}")
public JoinTripRequest getJoinRequest(@Auth
                                                 User driverOrPassenger,
                                                 @PathParam(value="joinRequestId")
                                                 long joinRequestId)
        Gets one particular join request.

      • getDiversionInSecondsForJoinRequest

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/joins/{joinRequestId}/diversionInSeconds")
public java.lang.Long getDiversionInSecondsForJoinRequest(@Auth
                                                                     User driverOrPassenger,
                                                                     @PathParam(value="joinRequestId")
                                                                     long joinRequestId)
                                                   throws RouteNotFoundException
        Computes the diversion in seconds for a driver if he accepts the query of the JoinTripRequest.
        Parameters:
        driverOrPassenger - a valid user
        joinRequestId - the id of the JoinTripRequest.
        Returns:
        the diversion in seconds the driver has to take to pick up the passenger of this request.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - if there is no route for the driver or the passenger.

      • getDiversionInMetersForJoinRequest

        @GET
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/joins/{joinRequestId}/diversionInMeters")
public java.lang.Long getDiversionInMetersForJoinRequest(@Auth
                                                                    User driverOrPassenger,
                                                                    @PathParam(value="joinRequestId")
                                                                    long joinRequestId)
                                                  throws RouteNotFoundException
        Computes the diversion in meters for a driver if he accepts the query of the JoinTripRequest.
        Parameters:
        driverOrPassenger - a valid user
        joinRequestId - the id of the JoinTripRequest.
        Returns:
        the diversion in meters the driver has to take to pick up the passenger of this request.
        Throws:
        RouteNotFoundException - if there is no route for the driver or the passenger.

      • updateJoinRequest

        @PUT
@UnitOfWork
@Path(value="/joins/{joinRequestId}")
public JoinTripRequest updateJoinRequest(@Auth
                                                    User driverOrPassenger,
                                                    @PathParam(value="joinRequestId")
                                                    long joinRequestId,
                                                    JoinTripRequestUpdate update)
        Updates a join request. Use this method if you want to advance the state of a join request, e.g. passenger enters / leaves car.
